mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ADSBSHA WHERE TE <= to_char((SYSDATE-1),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

select * from adsbsha
where rowid in (select min(rowid) from adsbsha where (lo>='121.32518' and lo<='121.34350') and (la>='31.17713' and la<='31.21944') and te>=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-15/60/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by fn having count(*)>=1)
ORDER BY te desc
